item.title: Making Redux Easy
item.description: React and Redux are a top choice for front end projects. React provides fast performance, easy ways to create shared components, and a plethora of libraries. Redux lets you simplify state management in your application, but it has serious drawbacks. In large projects, Redux bloat your project with repetitive code. To support a single store update, you need to create a reducer that handles an action type which is dispatched from an action called inside a component.
